casebody.data:
COLORADO DEPARTMENT OF STATE, Petitioner,
v.
Micheal BACA, et al. No. 19-518. Supreme Court of the United States. Jan. 17, 2020.

Motion of Thomas E. Weaver for leave to file a brief as amicus curiae in No. 19-518 granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the Supreme Court of Washington and to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit granted. The case is consolidated, and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
